cy_GB {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%d%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%s %h 5e %r%N%C%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    CountryISBNNumber { "826" }
    CountryNumber { "826" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u00A3",
            "GBP ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Welsh language locale for Great Britain" }
        Source { "thanks to Dafydd Tomos (dafydd@imaginet.co.uk)" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Welsh" }
        Territory { "Great Britain" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.8" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "wel" }
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[iItTyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "ie" }
        NoStr { "na" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "00" }
        InternationalPrefix { "44" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "Dydd EEEE dd a viz MMMM yyyy  z",
                    "Dydd EEEE dd a viz MMMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd.MMMM.yy",
                    "dd.MMMM.yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Sul",
                            "Llu",
                            "Maw",
                            "Mer",
                            "Iau",
                            "Gwe",
                            "Sad",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Sul",
                            "Llun",
                            "Mawrth",
                            "Mercher",
                            "Iau",
                            "Gwener",
                            "Sadwrn",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Ion",
                            "Chw",
                            "Maw",
                            "Ebr",
                            "Mai",
                            "Meh",
                            "Gor",
                            "Aws",
                            "Med",
                            "Hyd",
                            "Tach",
                            "Rha",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Ionawr",
                            "Chwefror",
                            "Mawrth",
                            "Ebrill",
                            "Mai",
                            "Mehefin",
                            "Gorffennaf",
                            "Awst",
                            "Medi",
                            "Hydref",
                            "Tachwedd",
                            "Rhagfyr",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
